short_description: A short description of the project.
long_description: A longer description of the project.

__prompts__.short_description: Provide a short description of the software. It should be a single line containing a single sentence. Maximum 150 characters are allowed.
__prompts__.long_description: Provide longer description of the software, between 150 and 10000 chars. It is meant to provide an overview of the capabilities of the software for a potential user.
__prompts__.status: What is the status of the project?
__prompts__.license: What license is the project under?
__prompts__.vcs: What version control system is used?
__prompts__.labor_hours: Provide the number of labor hours of the project
__prompts__.platforms: What platform does the software runs on?
__prompts__.categories: What categories best describes the project? List of categories: https://yml.publiccode.tools/categories-list.html?highlight=categories
__prompts__.software_type: What type of software is the project?
__prompts__.languages: What language(s) is the software written in?
__prompts__.maintenance: What is the maintenance status of the software?
__prompts__.tags: Provide a list of tags to describe the software
__prompts__.contact_name: A point of contact is needed for the project. What is the name of the point of contact?
__prompts__.contact_email: What is email address of the point of contact?
__prompts__.localisation: Does the software support multiple languages?
__prompts__.group: Which group is the project part of?
__prompts__.subset_in_healthcare: Which subset of healthcare does the project belong to?
__prompts__.user_input: Does the project accept user input? (e.g. allows user to query a database, allows login by users, upload files, etc.)
